name: Sleep Deprived
description:
Description: A quiet Shepherd is trying to get a good nights rest for the first time in awhile. Unfortunately Sleep Demons are haunting his dreams. Help him and his trusty sheep fight off the demons and get a good nights sleep for once.

Goal: Try and get your Shepherd to the far Left side of the map to move onto the next stage. Don't let yourself be pulled to the far Right side of the map or you'll lose the stage Try and win every stage!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys - Move around. Left Mouse Button - Select things Right Mouse Button - Cancel Actions OR Free Look activation/deactivation

Abilities: 

Shepherd 

Basic Attack - Plus-shape, Deals no Damage - Applies stacks of yellow orbs to demons 

Slow Shleepy - Slows everything in its AOE also applies yellow orb stacks to sleep demons 

Shleep Swap - Switch places with any other entity. 

Sheep 

Basic Attack - 2 range single target attack. Deals small amount of damage unless there are yellow orbs 

Ram - Same damage as basic attack but in a line. 

For the Shleep - Heals itself and removes all purple stacks.

Special Thanks 

We wouldn't have been able to get this far if it wasn't for turn-based RPG tutorials by http://theliquidfire.com/projects/ 

For Audio we used the Royalty Free song "Reservoir Sunset (Remastered)" by Axletree https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Axletree#contact-artist
